reviews.review_msg: She is very kind, helpful and fair. Weekly quizzes are easy as long as you memorized the vocabs. Midterm is an open topic. If you are taking chinese 152, take with her!

If you know some Mandarin before taking this course, it shouldn't be a hard course. Workload is very heavy for a 3 credit course, the work (mostly prepare orals, excercise, or dictations) is time-consuming but it does not kill braincells. Very easy to get C+ or above, impossible to get higher than A-. She is a great prof for this course.
